services.introText: Explore our core capabilities in embedded systems and industrial automation, designed to bring your projects from concept to reality.

cards.title: Embedded Systems Development
cards.description: From initial concept and microcontroller selection to firmware development and testing, we deliver robust and efficient embedded solutions tailored to your specific needs.

cards.title: Industrial Automation
cards.description: Enhance your operational efficiency with custom automation solutions, including PLC programming, control system design, and system integration for industrial environments.

cards.title: Prototyping & Production Support
cards.description: We bridge the gap from prototype to production, offering support with PCB design, small-batch manufacturing coordination, and design-for-manufacturability (DFM) guidance.

mission.subTitle: Hardware for Everyone
mission.introParagraph: Affordable and ethical mechanical, electronics, and embedded firmware development. Robust AE provides professional engineering services to individuals and companies looking for high-quality prototypes and short-run production solutions. Our goal is to lower the barrier to entering the world of hardware by offering fair pricing, insider knowledge, and structured approaches that provide value at every project stage.

points.title: Sustainable Design
points.text: We design products that are reliable, long-lasting, and environmentally conscious. By prioritizing reliability, repairability, and recyclability, your products will not only delight your customers for longer but also have a reduced environmental impact throughout their lifecycle.

points.title: Valuable Project Outputs
points.text: We understand that resources can be limited for startups and growing businesses. That's why we provide useful deliverables at every stage of your project. Whether it's a rapid prototype to secure additional funding, or software that helps you iterate quickly on your ideas, we tailor our approach to deliver what you actually need to succeed.

points.title: Industry Connections
points.text: With extensive experience in consumer and industrial hardware, we've built a valuable network of contacts that clients can benefit from. Whether you need manufacturing partners, compliance specialists, or branding expertise, we can connect you with trusted professionals who can support your hardware journey.

points.title: Passion & Experience
points.text: Our streamlined business model allows us to focus on what truly matters: delivering exceptional engineering. We're genuinely passionate about hardware - it's what drives us every day. Combined with our deep technical experience across various platforms and technologies, this enthusiasm ensures we can tackle your most challenging hardware projects with confidence and creativity.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.text: Reach out to discuss your project requirements or book a free consultation. Let's explore how Robust AE can help bring your ideas to life.
